name: copyright-notice
description: Auto-insert customizable copyright headers in any file format. Smart templating with dynamic year, timestamps, and multi-language support.

copyright-notice.languages.description: Languages that the extension will be activated for

copyright-notice.fileExtensions.description: File extensions to which the copyright notice will be applied (e.g., ['.js', '.ts', '.py']). Use ['*'] for all files.

copyright-notice.excludedFiles.description: File patterns to exclude from copyright notices (e.g., ['*.json', '*.config.js', 'package.json']). Supports glob patterns.

copyright-notice.template.description: Copyright notice template. Use {year} for the current year.

copyright-notice.includeTimestamp.description: Whether to include timestamp when the copyright notice was added. When enabled, use {timestamp} in your template.

copyright-notice.timestampFormat.description: Format of the timestamp (when includeTimestamp is enabled). Use YYYY (year), MM (month), DD (day), HH (hour), mm (minute), ss (second).

copyright-notice.includeUpdateTime.description: Whether to include and update the 'last updated' timestamp when files are modified. When enabled, use {updatetime} in your template.

copyright-notice.updateTimeFormat.description: Format of the update timestamp (when includeUpdateTime is enabled). Use YYYY (year), MM (month), DD (day), HH (hour), mm (minute), ss (second).

copyright-notice.autoRemoveEmojis.description: Whether to automatically remove all emojis from files when they are saved.
